Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Protonectarina-MP (natural AMPs; Mastoparan, insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals, XXA, UCLL1c)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (71.43%) toMastoparan-AL=A=k: 21%.Activity: Active against E. coli (MIC 7.8 ug/ml), P. aeruginosa (MIC 62.5 ug/ml), S. aureus (MIC 3.9 ug/ml), and B. subtilis (MIC 3.9 ug/ml) (de Souza et al.,2011).In vitro toxicity: human RBC: HC50 85.2 uM; rat RBC: HC50 326.5 uM (Ye et al., 2023).Structure:  random coil in water and helical in 8 mM SDS or 40% TFE.Updated 7/2024
Literature Information.Author: Dohtsu K, Okumura K, Hagiwara K, Palma MS, Nakajima T. 1993
Literature Information.Title: Isolation and sequence analysis of peptides from the venom of Protonectarina sylveirae (Hymenoptera-Vespidae).
